train_texts: This Agreement, made and entered into on this 1st day of January 2024, by and between ABC Corporation (hereinafter referred to as 'Company') and John Doe (hereinafter referred to as 'Consultant'), outlines the terms under which the Consultant agrees to provide strategic business development services to the Company. The Consultant shall perform duties as outlined in Exhibit A, including but not limited to market analysis and strategy formulation. This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of one year, with an option for renewal subject to mutual agreement.

In accordance with the provisions of the Employment Act 2020, any employee working more than 40 hours per week is entitled to overtime pay at a rate of 1.5 times their standard hourly wage. The employer must ensure that overtime hours are voluntary and compensated accordingly. Failure to comply with this regulation may result in penalties, including fines and potential revocation of operating licenses.
train_summaries: Agreement for business development services between ABC Corporation and Consultant for one year, renewable upon mutual agreement.
Employees working over 40 hours/week must receive 1.5x pay for overtime. Non-compliance may result in fines or license revocation.
